values: 歌剧；歌剧院；歌剧团；歌剧团体；歌剧作品；歌剧艺术；歌剧剧本

word_group.brief_definition: 歌剧歌手；歌剧院歌手；歌剧歌唱家
小型双筒望远镜；观剧镜

bilingual.source: He took me to an opera last night.
bilingual.target: 他昨晚带我去看了一场歌剧。

bilingual.source: Philip bought two tickets for The Phantom of the Opera.
bilingual.target: 菲利普买了两张《歌剧魅影》的票。

bilingual.source: When you come, you can visit the Sydney Opera House.
bilingual.target: 当你来的时候，你可以参观悉尼歌剧院。

bilingual.source: The director of the opera decided immediately during the woman's audition that the role suited her perfectly.
bilingual.target: 歌剧导演在女子试演时立即决定这个角色非常适合她。

bilingual.source: The classic opera will play at the opera house.
bilingual.target: 这部经典歌剧将在歌剧院上演。

bilingual.source: I watched Carmen at the opera house last night.
bilingual.target: 我昨晚在歌剧院观看了歌剧《卡门》。

bilingual.source: I love listening to bel canto opera.

bilingual.target: 她是一个著名的歌剧歌手。

list.abstract: opera是一款由挪威Opera Software ASA公司开发的浏览器，支持Windows、Linux、Mac等系统。 opera支持智能预读、智能缩放、手势操作，支持手机WAP和WWW站点全网浏览，具有网络同步、密码管理、快速拨号、网络加速及内置浏览提醒等功能。opera因为快速、小巧和比其他浏览器更佳的标准兼容性获得了国际上的最终用户和业界媒体的承认，并在网上受到很多人的推崇。
娥佩兰是运用日本先进技术、采用优质原料、以合理的中档价格为现代女性提供”品质一流、物超所值“的化妆品品牌。娥佩兰产品主要分为护肤品和彩妆两大类，其护肤品均具有很高的科技含量和极强的市场竞争力，彩妆也含多项PIAS专有技术。娥佩兰在深入了解了女性对于化妆品需求的基础上，接连不断地推出了众多深受消费者欢迎的经典产品，如：调量睫毛液、紧致焕肤凝露眼贴膜、极致修长睫毛液、洗甲水等。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? Do you fear the corrupting influence of opera?
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么 ？你怕听歌剧有伤风化吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. I didn't win those opera tickets, did I? No, I'm afraid not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以这些歌剧门票不是我中奖赢的，对吧？不，恐怕不是。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, she's about your age I say. Anyway I have tickets for the opera, Die Fledermaus, and I was wondering if you'd like to keep her company this evening?
yingyinNormal.zh: 她跟你差不多大，总之我有两张歌剧的票，“蝙蝠”（著名轻歌剧），你今晚愿意陪她吗？

yingyinNormal.en: What were you doing at the opera tonight? What? Aside from killing the Chancellor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你今晚在歌剧院干什么？除了暗杀总理还有别的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Just to the right, like white sails billowing in the breeze is the Sydney Opera House.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在右边，像白色风帆在微风中翻腾的是悉尼歌剧院。

yingyinNormal.en: Benji, we are trying to keep a low profile. You want drama, go to the opera.
yingyinNormal.zh: 班吉，我们都要努力保持低调，你想来点刺激的剧情，去看歌剧吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Whichever way you look, inside or outside, up or down, the Opera House is nothing less than an architectural miracle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无论您怎样看，从内到外，从上到下，歌剧院都绝对是个建筑奇迹。

yingyinNormal.en: Just behind the Opera House, on the site of Sydney's first farm are the Royal Botanic Gardens and the Sydney Domain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 歌剧院的后面有悉尼第一个农场，而这里则是悉尼皇家植物园和领地公园的所在地。

yingyinNormal.en: You're right, I can't. You know what? Anyone could rent that apartment now. An opera singer, the cast of stomp. Yeah, a tap-dancing pirate with a wooden leg.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我不知道，告诉你任何人都可能租那个房，歌剧歌手啦，跺脚舞演员啦，有条木腿的踢踏舞海盗啦。

yingyinNormal.en: A soap opera roof party?! I'm going to a soap opera roof party! Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
yingyinNormal.zh: 肥皂剧屋顶派对！我要参加肥皂剧屋顶派对！喔，我的天啊！好了，发泄完了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, you're roommate is a soap opera star. Your character is in a coma.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的室友是连续剧明星。你的角色在昏迷中。

yingyinNormal.en: The opera house that was gassed, he removed all provincial governors after that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 剧院毒气事件，那之后他换掉了所有省长。

yingyinNormal.en: Kick ass! Oh, God. We have to celebrate. You know we should do like a soap opera theme.
yingyinNormal.zh: 了不起。敬乔伊。那我们必须要庆祝，应该开个肥皂剧主题派对。

yingyinNormal.en: But Joey, you're gonna be fine. You don't need that show. It was just a dumb soap opera.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊，你不会有事的，你不需要那个节目，那只是个蠢的肥皂剧嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: We do believe the FSB participated in the first. We're still uncertain about the opera house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的确认为第一件事与俄联邦安全局有关。剧院事件我们仍不确定。

yingyinNormal.en: Him. He's former KSA, German intelligence, missing, presumed dead. He was at the opera tonight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他。沙特阿拉伯人，前德国特工失踪，推测已死亡。他就是今晚剧院的那个人。

yingyinNormal.en: You guys, this is Shelley, she's interviewing me for Soap Opera Digest, and Shelley, this are my friends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她是雪丽，她在访问我，雪丽，他们是我的朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Well, how about this? Kidnap Bernadette from the opera wearing a creepy mask so she doesn't know it's you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，那这么做你觉得怎样，你戴上诡异的面具，从剧院里把伯纳黛特劫走，这样她就认不出你了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, it must be one of those closed-circuit hospital channels. No, no. That's a soap opera. This is a very dramatic hospital.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那一定是医院里的闭路电视系统。不，那是肥皂剧。这是家充满戏剧性的医院。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, how much? Two thousand dollars? Two thousand dollars? What do you think I am, a soap opera star? Yeah. That's right, I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 多少钱呢？两千块。两千块？你以为我是谁？肥皂剧明星吗？是啊。没错，我就是。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a dramatic work in one or more acts, set to music for singers and instrumentalists
a company that performs opera; a building in which operas are performed

examination_example.sentence: Just because they can't sing <highlight>opera</highlight> or ride a bicycle doesn't mean that animals don't have culture. There's no better example of this than killer whales.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动物不会唱歌剧或骑自行车，并不意味着它们没有文化。关于这一点，没有比虎鲸更好的例子了。

direction_info.description:

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 歌剧歌手；歌剧院歌手；歌剧歌唱家

examination_example.sentence: Beijing <highlight>Opera</highlight> is a kind of entertainment.
An <highlight>opera</highlight> singer neither dances nor speaks on stage usually.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 歌剧演员通常既不跳舞也不在舞台上讲话。

examination_example.sentence: It has one <highlight>opera</highlight> singer on stage.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 舞台上有一位歌剧演员。
